subject: Horse Racing
Zenyatta (Race Horse)
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Rapid Redux won his 20th consecutive race, breaking Zenyatta and Peppers Pride’s modern record for consecutive wins, at Mountaineer Racetrack.
snippet: Rapid Redux won his 20th consecutive race, breaking Zenyatta and Peppers Pride’s modern record for consecutive wins, at Mountaineer Racetrack.
